comments: Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in Haliburton's (IND) path and makes marginal contact to Haliburton's side as they disengage.
Martin (MIA) is in Hield's (IND) path when he absorbs the contact in his chest on the perimeter.
Vincent (MIA) moves alongside Nembhard's (IND) path with vertical arms and absorbs the body contact during the drive.
Adebayo (MIA) makes contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Turner (IND) before incidental arm contact occurs.
Nesmith (IND) is jumping from point A to point B when he makes body contact with Martin (MIA) that affects his layup attempt prior to any contact with the ball.
Turner (IND) establishes himself in Vincent's (MIA) path and absorbs the contact as Vincent attempts to move around the screen.
Martin (MIA) extends a forearm on McConnell's (IND) upper body, which affects his SQBR during his drive.
Turner (IND) is already in Butler's (MIA) path with his arm slightly outward, which grazes Butler on the perimeter. The contact is marginal.
Nembhard (IND) and Butler (MIA) engage and disengage with one another and marginal contact occurs off-ball.
Nembhard (IND) lightly brushes Adebayo's (MIA) arm during his drive and he is able to move through the marginal contact.
Nembhard (IND) makes contact with the ball at the end of Adebayo's (MIA) drive, causing both players to make simultaneous contact with it. A jump ball is correctly assessed.
Turner (IND) engages with Butler's (MIA) upper body and separates as Martin (MIA) is already retrieving the rebound.
McConnell (IND) initiates contact with Vincent's (MIA) arm at the start of his drive and the contact affects Vincent's SQBR.
Martin (MIA) rests his hands on Turner (IND) as they both move up the court, causing them to briefly engage and separate.
Martin (MIA) wraps Turner (IND) during the pick and affects his FOM.
Hield (IND) places his forearm to Herro's (MIA) front in transition and marginal contact occurs during his drive.
Haliburton (IND) is out in front of Vincent (MIA) when Vincent extends his arm to initiate the contact on the perimeter.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests Turner's (IND) jump shot attempt.
Hield (IND) is the last person to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds. The possession is correctly awarded to MIA.
McConnell (IND) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Butler (MIA) prior to incidental arm contact occurring during the drive.
McConnell (IND) dislodges the ball out of bounds. Possession correctly remains with MIA.
Hield (IND) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Adebayo (MIA) prior to any incidental occurring thereafter.
Turner (IND) has his foot planted on the ground when incidental contact occurs between the ball and his leg/foot.
After the handoff, Turner (IND) and Vincent (MIA) briefly engage before separating.
Vincent (MIA) inbounds the ball within 5 seconds.
Hield (IND) places his hand to Herro's (MIA) side as he moves towards the midcourt line and quickly slides his hand off.
Haliburton (IND) briefly places his hand to Adebayo (MIA) and slides his hand off as he gathers the entry pass.
Haliburton (IND) initiates contact with Adebayo's (MIA) arm and affects Adebayo's SQBR.
Turner (IND) wraps his arm around Adebayo's (MIA) side before making any contact with the ball.
Haliburton (IND) brings his off-arm toward Butler (MIA) and marginal contact occurs as Haliburton (IND) releases away without applying any force.
Turner (IND) commits a take foul on Adebayo (MIA). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
